---
title: "QHD Results"
format: pdf
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Load necessary libraries
library(reticulate)
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd

# Sample data
qhd_results = pd.DataFrame({
  'DiameterRemoved': [1, 2, 3],
  'AvgMSE': [0.1, 0.2, 0.3],
  'TrainPerformance': [0.9, 0.8, 0.85],
  'ValPerformance': [0.85, 0.8, 0.75],
  'TestPerformance': [0.8, 0.75, 0.7],
  'MSEDeletedDiameter': [0.05, 0.1, 0.15],
  'MSEBEPs': [0.02, 0.03, 0.04]
})
# Convert DataFrame to Markdown format
table_md = qhd_results.to_markdown(index=False)

```

```{r}

# Print the Markdown table in the document
cat(py$table_md)
```
